live_updates: Technicians will continue working to restore service and we will have further updates in the morning.  Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
36252.summary: Some customers in Carstairs are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36252.title: Apr 13 – Carstairs | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
